评论详情: I needed several gift boxes for necklaces for Christmas presents.  I made these work.  The necklaces I was gifting were three strands in one…I quickly realized I was asking a bit much from the size of these boxes.  Single strand necklaces with small pendants would fit best in these boxes.  Earrings and bracelets don’t fit well.  The boxes are pretty though…I bought the pink.

评论概述: Nice but thinner than I wanted
评论详情: O.K. But a little thin. Only good foe necklaces
Excellent product, very good quality, and the color is really nice.
These necklace box’s are really a nice touch for my customers !! VERY CLASSY.. I bought the Pink & the Tiffany Blue.. Will purchase again.

I was looking for an elegant gift box to hold holiday gifts for my best Mary Kay clients, and these seemed to be exactly what I was looking for, IF the boxes were as good as described. I contemplated this for months before making a purchase, but I'm delighted to say that these are really, really great! The quality, sturdiness, square-ness of the corners, and finish of the boxes are spot on! If you've been considering these, I can verify that they are completely worth every penny!
They are so pretty and look so good as gift boxes for my ladies 💕
Great boxes for dice! Hoping to buy more soon when the right color is in stock.
Very sturdy! No glue smell, foam lining with velvety top. Velvety top isn't shedding. Boxes are white inside. No defects or indents on all 12 of them. Color is natural, but on a darker side.

These are really nice looking boxes for necklaces or bracelets and watches. They are very thick and sturdy and the lining is soft and nice inside. They open easily. I would not ship in just that box but they are nice to put your item in and then put in a shipping box. It makes a nice display piece for any items your selling. The price is probably right since its really an upgraded item.
